viewData.name: Acer 15.6" Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop (Black)
viewData.short_description: Buy Acer 15.6" Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop (Black) featuring 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H Six-Core, 16GB DDR4 | 1TB HDD & 256GB SSD 15.6" Full HD 1920 x 1080 IPS Display. Review Acer Helios 300
viewData.long_description: Play your favorite PC games in style with Acer 15.6" Predator Helios 300 Gaming Laptop, complete with a textured metal finish and a black/red color scheme. The keyboard also has a numeric keypad and red backlighting.
